properties.name: mail.sender.address
properties.description: Sender email address that appears in the notification mails' header.

properties.name: mail.sender.name
properties.description: Sender name that appears in the notification mails' header.

properties.name: mail.admin-notification-address
properties.description: Email address used as recipient for administrator notifications.

properties.name: mail.date-pattern
properties.description: Format pattern for dates appearing in mails, defaults to 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss z'.
